column1: Portugal Travel Insurance, a travel insurance adapted to the new pandemic reality caused by Covid-19 - an initiative that Turismo de Portugal to strengthen the security of the destination http://portugaltravelinsurance.com/ Portugal Health Passport - renewal, which now includes Covid-19 tests and is available to all who visit our country https://www.portugalhealthpassport.com/
